document_data.name: Warrior's Plague
document_data.mainbody: The '''Warrior's Plague''' was a devastating [[disease]] that struck the ancient [[Calimshan|Calimshan Empire]] ''circa'' {{Yearlink|-4900}}.
document_data.Acquisition: The disease was spread through contact with the blood of infected individuals.
document_data.Effects: The Warrior's Plague caused the infected to go mad with rage and attack others wildly, leading to widespread death.
document_data.History: The plague was centered on [[Almraiven]] and [[Calimport]], although it mostly afflicted members of the military. Among the armed forces, casualties were higher than 40%, while among civilian populations such as in Calimport, casualties were around 14%.
